Morning everyone, Quick question on Ubuntu (running on a desktop with only a VGA out plug for the monitor).  Would running a VGA to DVI line to a TV suffice for TV display?
does the tv say you can or should connect a PC to the DVI connection?  If so then you should be fine.  If not then don't.
well if burning out your TV is ok, then test it out.  Otherwise try calling the manufacturer or checking the web site.  Most have manuals if you have lost yours
